scriptmodule.description:
Checks, whether the content of both search result containers on top and below the result list are equal.
@Parameters: SortMethod: checks the dropdown list (e.g. Top Sellers) ItemsPerPage: checks the dropdown list (e.g. 12) ShownProducts: checks the text (e.g. 1-12) MaxItems: checks the maximum number of search results CurrentPage: number of the page currently displayed NumberOfPages: checks the number of pages
